content.name: Mimic Repeat Orders
content.description:
The impossible is possible: use the Mimic behavior for Repeat Orders.
[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Assign any appropriate Player-owned ship to commander with [b]Repeat Orders[/b] enabled as subordinate with [b]Mimic[/b] behavior. [*] The subordinate ship will copy the [b]Repeat Orders[/b] of its commander. [*] Ships with insufficient AI Pilot skill to use [b]Repeat Orders[/b] will be not assigned or removed. [*] Any changes to the commander's [b]Repeat Orders[/b] will be automatically reflected on the subordinate ship. [*] Works with [b]Sell[/b], [b]Buy[/b] and [b]MiningPlayer[/b] vanilla orders. [*] Works with [b]MiningPlayerSector[/b] order from the [b]Mining in Sector for Mimic Repeat Orders[/b] mod. [/list] [h2][b]Limitations[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Only one level of [b]Mimic[/b] behavior is supported. Ships assigned as subordinates to subordinate ships will not be able to mimic their orders. [*] Changes to subordinate ship's will be reflected with small delay, up to 30 seconds. [*] Supports only limited amount of orders. Other order types may be supported in future versions. [/list] [h2][b]Requirements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]X4: Foundations[/b] 7.60 or newer (tested on 7.60 and 8.00). [*] [b]Mod Support APIs[/b] by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url] to be installed and enabled. Version [b]1.93[/b] and upper is required. [list] [*] It is available via Steam - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2042901274]SirNukes Mod Support APIs[/url] [*] Or via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/503]Mod Support APIs[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Installation[/b][/h2]
You can download the latest version via Steam client - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3599279973]Mimic Repeat Orders[/url] Or you can do it via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1875]Mimic Repeat Orders[/url]
[h2][b]Usage[/b][/h2]
Simple use the usual context menu options to assign a ship to commander with Repeat Orders enabled as subordinate using the [b]Mimic[/b] behavior.
[h2][b]Video[/b][/h2]
Video demonstration of the Mimic Repeat Orders. Version 1.00 [previewyoutube=6pT75XC8MUs;full][/previewyoutube]
[h2][b]Non-vanilla Orders[/b][/h2]
[h2]Mining in Sector for Mimic Repeat Orders[/h2]
Simple mining routine for player owned ships in sector to be managed by Repeat Orders
You can download the latest version via Steam client - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3602563805]Mining in Sector for Mimic Repeat Orders[/url].
Or you can do it via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1880]Mining in Sector for Mimic Repeat Orders[/url]
